Property.Name: Gate is in same room as switch
Property.Description: if set, the switch will assume there's a gate following the switch in the PLM list

Property.Name: Switch displays message box
Property.Description: if set, the switch will display the message box chosen in the ASM file

Property.Name: Switch affects total gate count
Property.Description: if set, the switch will decrement the total amount of gates in the hack, otherwise, it just opens it's corresponding gate

Property.Name: Door ID
Property.Description: Door ID the switch will set as opened
